channel.title: [UNOFFICIAL] Tournament for the Throne V + Website Announcement
channel.description:
Tournament for the Throne celebrates its fifth anniversary with a revamped viewing and scoring system! Spectator mode, Skill based Point Incentives, and more will make this is the best Throne of Lies Esports event yet. The tournament kicks off on April 21st*, has an 80 dollar prize pool, and will be streamed
Sign-up and learn more about the tournament on the unofficial Throne of Lies Esports website!
